content.text:
# AAW Heritage Championship

The AAW Heritage Championship (previously known as AAW Cruiserweight Championship) is a professional wrestling championship created and promoted by the American professional wrestling promotion All American Wrestling.
Title history
As of  , , there have been a total of 39 reigns and 1 vacancy shared between 30 different wrestlers. The inaugural champion was Dan Lawrence.
The current champion is Robert Anthony, who is in his first reign. He defeated Joe Alonzo on February 28, 2025, at Epic in Berwyn, Illinois.
